metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8798 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description:
rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain an Out-Of-Bounds Read in function rdpsnd_process_ping() that results in an information leak.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8798` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

rdesktop - 1.8.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rdesktop package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.4-1').
